DOC.brief_title: TEAM : Testosterone Supplementation Exercise Elderly Men
DOC.detailed_description: Studies suggest testosterone ( T ) replacement healthy elderly men beneficial effect body composition , muscle , bone , memory , behavior , risk chronic treatment , especially prostate , heart , sleep quality , entirely clear . Therefore , desirable supplement low `` effective '' range elderly men . However , effect low usual replacement T dose well study . Furthermore , possible important interaction exercise enhance positive effect T supplementation , yet mitigate possible side effect , study old men . This one-year study enroll 150 men low-normal slightly normal serum total T level . Participants randomize one 6 treatment group receive T supplementation ( AndroGel ) 25mg/day , 50 mg/day placebo cross progressive resistance training ( PRT ) exercise 3 time week versus none . At end study , participant exercise-control group offer PRT . Please see link updated version full protocol .
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy , untrained men 60 year old lownormal testosterone level ( 200350ng/dL ) Must reside Denver metro area Prostate/breast cancer Unable exercise safely severe obesity ( > 34 body mass index [ BMI ] ) Polycythemia Diabetes Use drug could affect T level Cognitive dysfunction ( MMSE less 24 ) PSA ageadjusted normal level AUA great 19 Unable pas stress test due active CAD
